title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Benefactor Vorschlaghammer
content:
GTA+ Members can claim the Benefactor Vorschlaghammer (Sedan) and Drift Tuning Upgrade for free through September 4.

The Benefactor Vorschlaghammer may have the body of a sedan, but the V8 engine under its hood goes from 0-60 faster than you can say Vorschlaghammer.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
